issue.title: Multiple imu sensors are called imu_sensor

content.raw:
We use a namespace approach for objects, where object names must be unique with the scope of their parent. Your parse could identify an imu_sensor by looking at its parent link and model.

I do see your point, and normally I would change it. However, we are trying to limit the number of changes made to VRC related software. If this is truly a minor issue, then we will let it lie until after the VRC.
content.html:
We use a namespace approach for objects, where object names must be unique with the scope of their parent. Your parse could identify an imu_sensor by looking at its parent link and model.

I do see your point, and normally I would change it. However, we are trying to limit the number of changes made to VRC related software. If this is truly a minor issue, then we will let it lie until after the VRC.
